content: Is anyone here going to be at the Oslo IHE meeting next week?
ok thanks. So there's going to be some discussion with DHIS2 there, I here, and I'm wondering if there's anyone with the right background in FHIR to be part of that discussion?
the discussion with the DHIS2 people will be with everyone from the 4 IHE domains present - Pharm, ITI, PCC, QRPH.
ok. It's not clear to me quite what the use cases are, and I expect their interests to lie right across FHIR
Agenda is open but it will surely include our strategy and roadmap for using FHIR.
I am. Specifically for IHE UBP FHIR.
I was wondering the same -- Apparently it's a IHE Pharmacy profile http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php/Uniform_Barcode_Processing

Barcode decoding operation.
"I have a barcode string, please parse and tell what this thing is"
"Here, it is a medication with the following GTIN, lot, etc."
